channel.title: CVE Feed for ESET, spol. s r.o. -- ESET Cyber Security
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ESET, spol. s r.o. -- ESET Cyber Security

item.title: CVE-2024-6654|2024-09-27T17:56:50.919Z -- eset%2C%20spol.%20s%20r.o. -- eset%20cyber%20security
item.description: Products for macOS enables a user logged on to the system to perform a denial-of-service attack, which could be misused to disable the protection of the ESET security product and cause general system slow-down.
